person.persName: John S. Langdon (Perry Co. KY, laborer and private 14th Ky. Cav.)

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac T. Langdon and Marinda Langdon. Married to Jane Langdon. Father of Henry Langdon. Resident in Perry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Student and laborer in Perry County in 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A) as private from May 26, 1863, to March 24, 1864.
